title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 203.11 - Collection of assessment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 203.11 - Collection of assessment

State Regulations
(a) Each grower shall be responsible for the payment of the proper assessment upon
the number of acres of onions in production. (b) All program assessments due shall be
remitted to the commissioner or the designated fiscal agent on or before

January 1st. Such annual remittances and accounting shall be inclusive of the
declared planted acres of onions in production in each marketing
season. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
203.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
